title: | Video | Ghulaam actor Vikkas Manaktala's romantic surprise for wife Gunjan is super-sweet | Television Videos | - India Today
text:
Ghulaam actor Vikkas Manaktala's romantic surprise for wife Gunjan is super-sweet IndiaToday.in | February 12, 2017 BB10 contestant Mona Lisa and husband Vikrant celebrate Valentine's Day Embed Feedback 
Ghulaam actor Vikkas Manaktala is a Delhi boy, and while he was in the capital, he made sure that his wife Gunjan had a blast. A romantic blast, to be more precise. And she did. The couple spent a lovely evening together in a cute little diner of Hauz Khas Village. The actor had arranged for a mango cake, flowers, and other lovely things for his dear wife. Of course, Gunjan loved all of it. The two even danced together, and it was all very romantic. Vikkas confessed that he wanted Gunjan to have a good time in his place. Gunjan, on the other hand, was quite touched by the gesture, and promised to never get upset with the good-looking actor. Watch the video to know more. Next Video
